Welcome to RST: Decision Region Analysis’s documentation!¶

src.data_input.load_attributes(csv_file, subgroup_information={}, image_path_column='Path', id_column=None, missing_information='raise', info_format='categorical', rel_path=None, n_processes=None)¶

Loads image filepaths and patient attributes from provided csv file.

Parameters:

  • csv_file (str) – Filepath to summary csv.

  • subgroup_information (dict) – WIP

  • image_path_column (str, optional) – Name of column in csv_file listing image filepaths.

  • id_column (str, optional) – Name of columns in csv_file listing unique patient/sample identifiers.

  • missing_information (str, optional, options=[‘raise’, ‘remove’], default=’raise’) – How to handle samples missing information; ‘raise’: raise an exception, ‘remove’: remove samples missing information

  • info_format (str, optional) – Format to return patient information in.

  • rel_path (str, optional) – Declare a relative path for image file paths.

  • n_processes (int, optional) – Number of processes to use while checking image file paths, if None, uses number of available cores.

Returns:

DataFrame of ids, image filepaths, and subgroup information.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame
